item.title: Directed Steps
item.description:
Ground Rules and Goals

Welcome aboard my new blog srs.fyi! Do mind your step.

The purpose of this blog is two-fold, in order of importance:

  1. to record my musings and learnings;
  2. to share my thoughts with others.

While we’re here, let’s take care of some other housekeeping items:

  • Scope: the scope of the blog includes anything that catches my interest, though I expect most posts to be technically oriented and related to my academic and professional interests.
  • Schedule: the blog will have no schedule; I will write things as they come, at their own pace.
  • Ads: this blog will have no ads or affiliate links (though I may link to things that I like just because I like them).

More broadly and in no particular order, I want my corner of the web to:

  1. be a domain of my own where I can create;
  2. be a place where I can polish and curate my thoughts;
  3. have a quirky, chill, and thoughtful ambiance.

Steps Ahead

I’ve been wanting to do this blog for a long time! Somehow, it feels like it has taken longer than it should (which is a sentiment I feel about a lot of things in life). In the midst of that, there is a passage from the Bible has always been an encouragement to me:

A manâ€™s heart plans his way,
But the Lord directs his steps.

Proverbs 16:9

No matter how long you join me on this journey, I’m glad to have you!
